item.title: Coffee Hours - Every Monday
item.description:
Join us every Monday for PhD Coffee Hour!

When: Mondays at 2:30 PM
Where: CSE Building

Where ideas brew over coffee and pastries. New students especially welcome! ‚òï

item.title: Social Hours - Fun Fridays in CSE
item.description:
End your week on a high note with Fun Fridays in CSE! Join us for games, snacks, and great conversations.

When: Fridays, 4:00 PM - 6:00 PM
Where: CSE Graduate Lounge
